title: NHSRC Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Consultant Posts
description: The National Health Systems Resource Centre (NHSRC) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, B.Sc Nursing, B.Pharm, MD/ MS can grab this chance and apply for the NHSRC Notification 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online throug...
